title: Looking for an adc main to play with plat+
body: Hey! Just made it to plat and I was so excited to play with some good quality adc's :D Buttttt.. the first 3 games in plat the ones I have been getting have been less then desireable lmao. Soo chuck me an add if you're a good adc in plat elo haha, I main support, and have climbed  playing ardent supports mainly.
